page.title: 20St Annes - Churches contd.
page.content:
{Fairhaven Congregational : }1907_12 (Briggs,Wolstenholme & Thornely).All_ white faience slabs,resembling Byzantine or S.W. French Romanesque though details Edwardian Baroque.Magnificent stained glass depicting Luther,Latimer,Pilgrim Fathers and others.Designed by Charles Elliott made by Abbot & Co. {Modern Synagogue : }1960 ______________________________________
Information collected and collated by pupils of the {FIRST}and {THIRD} years of : LYTHAM ST.ANNES COUNTY HIGH SCHOOL
Supervised by Staff of the History Department.
Typed in by : Stephen Whymark & Simon Edwards
